Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Darmanian Way, south of John's Music Shop and north of the Blue Rose Meditation Center for clerics requiring a meditation room.
Room.LongDescription: John's Music Shop provides bards and minstrels with all sorts of strange and exotic musical instruments to entertain guests. The Blue Rose Meditation Chamber on the south side of the road provides clerics and priests with a quiet meditation area, free from the hastles and chaos of the city streets.
